about_the_game:
A shooting game featuring sea turtles that can be played easily with simple controls that only require moving up and down and shooting bubbles!

  • Game play because of the sea turtle
.Thanks to its shell, it can prevent attacks from behind (except for attribute attacks such as electricity), and the bubbles can be used as a shield, making it very defensive.
However, they need to breathe out of the water to avoid suffocation, so it is important to position yourself either at the bottom of the sea, where you have an advantage, or near the surface of the water, where you can breathe easily!

  • Power up with consecutive hits
.The sea turtle's voltage will increase if you make many consecutive hits in one shot!
As voltage increases, breathing lasts longer, allowing you to fight longer.
Furthermore, with voltage over 100%, you can shoot powerful bubbles and may be able to turn the tide out of a dangerous situation!

  • Abundant Ocean
Numerous unique sea creatures and special stage gimmicks make for a challenging game!
The further you progress, the stronger and more numerous the enemies become.
How many Waves can you reach?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8265U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Family
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Explore the world's oceans with a sea turtle that has the ability to inflate bubbles! Bubbles can be used as bullets or shields. But be careful not to over-inflate the bubbles and suffocate! Watch your timing and jump out of the water to breathe. Turtles are lung-breathers.
